sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import {getBestSeller, getMensWear, getWomensWear} from '../../../services/index' import {addToCart, addToWishlist, addToCompare} from "../../../actions/index"; import ProductItem from '../../../../components/layouts/common/product-item'; import Commerce from "@chec/commerce.js"; const commerce = new Commerce( "pk_25095f6ed4dac89f69f1e4337484555ec6c07ef2fc5d8" ); class Details extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { products: [], }; } componentDidMount() { commerce.products.list().then((result) => { this.setState({ products: result.data }); }); } render (){ const {item, addToWishlistClicked, addToWishlist,ClickedbestSeller,mensWear,womensWear, symbol, addToCart, addToCompare} = this.props return (

{item.name}

product details

{item.shortDetails}

Febric: Chiffon
Color: {item.variants[0].color}
Avalibility: InStock
share it
100% SECURE PAYMENT
) } } export default Details;
